description: Template for GroveMonitor secrets. Copy this to secrets.json and fill in real values.

instructions.CF_API_TOKEN: Create at: https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens (Needs: Analytics:Read, D1:Read, R2:Read, Workers:Read)
instructions.CF_ACCOUNT_ID: Find at: https://dash.cloudflare.com -> Account ID in the sidebar
instructions.ALERT_EMAIL_TO: Email address where you want to receive alerts

usage.wrangler: Set secrets via: wrangler secret put <SECRET_NAME> --env production
usage.local_dev: For local development, create a .dev.vars file with these values
